text: kuduhu imunu iyoghula keli nzahabu tsawo, pfesa tsawo, madini ghawo ghanoghile, lulu, maghwanda ghanoghile, maghwanda gha langi ya tsambalau, maghwanda madung'u, maghwanda mabewe na chila chinu cha mbiki ighunung'ila ghoya, wala cha membe tsa nembo, pfinu pfa bei ng'ulu pfa mbao, shaba na pfa chuma na pfa malumalu,
